q1: Eden Hazard is the best captain Belgium has ever had.
q2: What are your thoughts on Marouane Fellaini's performance in the 2018 World Cup?
a2: I thought he was one of the best.
q3: How do you think Lukaku did?
a3: he did very well and he took it to his team but not enough to win
q4: It seemed very strange to me that I did not win the world cup
a4: Lukaku is having an unbelievable young career
